name: Mojito the Cat
description:
Add Mojito to your Wishlist!

MOJITO THE CAT

Roll arround with Mojito, a cube-shaped cat and push your space vision to the limit, use the logic to find the shortest path to the exit.
Rotate the pieces to reach all coins, get the fish scrape and go to the gate to jump to the next level


Help Mojito the Cute Cat explore the different worlds, unlock all characterized skins and solve all the puzzles with the few number of movements to get 3 golden cubes in every level

EASY RULE

Pick all yarn balls and fish scrape and go to the end point. Do it with the least number of moves.
Easy starting levels for newbie players
Hard ending levels for extreme players

6 WORLDS 60 LEVELS

Trainning Gardens, Oasis, Woodland, Ice, Volcano & Fantasy

UNLOCK SKINS

11 Cute & Unique unlockable hand painted 3d cube Skins. Customize your player cube

COLLECT ALL THE UNIQUE SKINS
